Sachin is responsible for designing the Open Source & AI strategy for an energy company.
He dons two hats as he has a degree in law & engineering, he has previously held positions such as Open Source counsel, Open Source Evangelist & Open Source analyst with HPE, HERE Technologies & Honeywell respectively.
